name: Active Life: Extreme Challenge
storyline: Kick the family into high gear with 'extreme' themed sport features such as base jumping, street luge, and rock climbing. Whether you want to swoosh down the hills of San Francisco in a street luge, scale the cliffs of the Grand Canyon, or kite-surf in the crystal blue waters of the Pacific, this game will get your heart pumping!
summary: Active Life: Extreme Challenge is the follow up to the successful Family Trainer game/mat bundle. Embracing the 'active gaming' trend, Active Life games use a mat controller along with the Wii Remote to incorporate the player's entire body into gameplay.
